subject: Golf
Assaults
Sociology
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: When a golf club is swung as a weapon, golf is no longer a game. To remedy golf rage, members of the golf community are stressing basic etiquette and reminding people to have fun.
snippet: When a golf club is swung as a weapon, golf is no longer a game. To remedy golf rage, members of the golf community are stressing basic etiquette and reminding people to have fun.
